UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial specificity and mechanism of action of disulfide-removed linear analogs of the plant-derived Cys-rich antimicrobial peptide Ib-AMP1.
Literature.Author: Wang P, Bang JK, Kim HJ, Kim JK, Kim Y, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=>32µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3543(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2095(MIC=>32µM)
